ask.front: Who played lead guitar for the British rock band Queen?
ask.text: Brian May played lead guitar for the British rock band Queen.

ask.front: Who is the lead singer for the American rock band Pearl Jam?
ask.text: Eddie Vedder is the lead singer for the American rock band Pearl Jam.

ask.front: Who was the lead singer of the band Audioslave?
ask.text: Chris Cornell was the lead singer of the band Audioslave.
